entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:34 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 12:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -35.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -39.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
